title: Sibling Advicery: Size Queen/Dressing Fem
description:
Out of options because you've met every single person on Tinder? Want to dress in more expressive outfits but are afraid of judgement from others? Wondering if it's okay to be a size queen? This week on Sibling Advicery, Monét and Bob give advice to their listeners on sex, friendships, confidence and so much more!!
Don’t fall for subscription scams. Start cancelling today at Truebill.com/RIVALRY.
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
